channel.title: COW on SixSixtySix Corp.
channel.description: Recent content in COW on SixSixtySix Corp.

item.title: Dirty COW (CVE-2016-5195)
item.description: author:[anusO1] COW (Copy on Write) Copy on Write is an optimization technique that allows virtual pages of memory in different processes, which have identical content to map to the same physical memory pages. If one of the processes writes to one of these shared pages, the data is copied to a new physical page and the virtual-to-physical-memory mappings are updated according to the changes. This techniqie is used (and abused) in many different scenarios.
